meanings.definition: Able to be achieved or reached.
meanings.sent1: Setting small goals is important to make progress towards attainable achievements.
meanings.sent2: With hard work and dedication, success is attainable for everyone.
meanings.sent3: Even climbing the tallest mountain is attainable with the right gear and determination.
meanings.sent4: The dream of becoming a professional athlete seemed unattainable until she started training every day.
meanings.sent5: The key to success is breaking down big tasks into smaller, attainable steps.

meanings.sent1: The rare gemstone was so valuable that only a few collectors could afford it, but it was still attainable for some.
meanings.sent2: The job offer was attainable for anyone with the right qualifications and experience.
meanings.sent3: In the world of magic, the elusive spellbook was finally attainable after years of searching.
meanings.sent4: The secret to happiness is realizing that true contentment is attainable through simple pleasures.
meanings.sent5: The ancient artifact was believed to hold immense power, but its location remained attainable only to the chosen few.
